task.title: Editing a WebHelp Publishing Template from oXygen XML Editor/Author
task.shortdesc: Describes how to edit a WebHelp Publishing Template by using the oXygen XML Editor/Author.

context.p: Use this procedure whenever you want to edit a WebHelp Publishing Template package.

step.cmd: Unzip the ZIP archive associated with the WebHelp Publishing Template in a separate folder. Skip this step if your publishing template is already stored in a folder.
Link the folder associated with the WebHelp Publishing Template.
